description:
Derek is an active-duty Marine. He's 20 years old and I met him through an acquaintance who loves to (shall we say) "hang around" the military bases.
I was supposed to meet up with Derek on an afternoon a few weeks ago. He finally arrived on his motorcycle, about an hour late. He seemed really excited.
"Is everything OK?" I asked.
"Yeah, I almost got busted on my way down here," he replied.
Apparently he was going 110 mph on the freeway and passed a highway patrol car, which immediately began pursuit. He was able to exit into a residential neighborhood and lose the cops.
"You know, you really shouldn't..." I began, then stopped myself. He's a 20-year-old Marine with a crotch rocket. What are you going to do...
"So do you live on base?" I asked him.
"I used to, but not anymore," he replied.
"Why not?"
"No privacy," he replied. "Can't jerk off without a bunch of other guys hearing you."
I learned that he likes to look at himself in the mirror when he masturbates. It's kind of hard to do that in the barracks.
"Do you like being in the service?" I asked.
"Hell, yeah. It's awesome," he said with a smile. "Best way to meet chicks. They love military guys."
"You get a lot play then?"
"Yes sir. Lots."
I believe him too. He's really hot! Beautiful eyes, handsome face, hairy, muscular body, and a nice dick. What's not to love?
title: Derek
